#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, n, ct, i, j;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d", &n );
		ct = 0;
		
		for( i = 2;i <= n;i++ )
			for( j = 1;j < i;j++ )
				if( ( ( i * j ) % ( i + j ) ) == 0 )
					ct++;
		
		printf("%d\n", ct );
		
	}

	return 0;
}
